verses.1: Ka Pasian le ka Kumpipa aw, nangmah hong pahtawi-in a tawntungin nangma min kong phatphat ding hi.
verses.2: Nisimin hong pahtawi-in a tawntungin nangma min kong phatphat ding hi.
verses.3: Topa lian hi; nakpi takin phat ding hi a, ama liatna ngaihsut zawh ding hi lo hi.
verses.4: A khang a khangin nangma nasepnate kiphatphat dinga, a vanglian na bawlnate kigengen ding hi.
verses.5: Na liatna le na minthanna a lamdang nangma sepnate ka lung ngaingai ding hi.
verses.6: A vanglian nangma bawlnate mite in taangko ding uh a, nangma vangliatna mah kei zong ka pulak ding hi.
verses.7: Amaute in nangma liatna, na minthanna gen khia-in nangma thumanna nakpi takin sa ding uh hi.
verses.8: Topa dikin hehpihna nei a, heh hak mahmah in itna kip lianpi a nei hi.
verses.9: Topa pen mi khempeuh tungah hoih a, a bawl sa khempeuh tungah hehpihna a nei hi.
verses.10: Topa aw, nangma bawl sa khempeuh in nangma tungah lungdamna hong ko ding uh a, na mi siangtho khempeuh in nang hong phat ding uh hi.
verses.11: Amaute in na kumpi gam a minthanna thu gengenin na vangliatna thu sutsut ding uh a,
verses.12: a vanglian nangma sepnate le na kumpi gam a hoihna, a minthannate mi khempeuh tungah kitheisak ding uh hi.
verses.13: Nangma kumpi gam pen a kip tawntung kumpi gam hi a, nangma ukna khang tawntungin a kip hi. A thuciamna khempeuh ah Topa thutak mahmah a, a gamtatna khempeuh ah zong hehpihna a nei ahi hi.
verses.14: Topa in a puk mite khempeuh huh a, niamsakna a thuakte khempeuh a sangtosak hi.
verses.15: Nuntak husanna a nei khempeuhte始 mit in nang hong en uh a, a hun a tun ciangin amaute an na vak hi.
verses.16: Nangmah in na khut na hong a, nuntak husanna a nei khempeuhte始 deihna a kicingin na pia hi.
verses.17: Topa pen a sepna khempeuh ah thutang a, a gamtatna khempeuh ah hehpihna a nei hi.
verses.18: Amah a sam mi khempeuh kiangah Topa nai om a, lungsim takpi tawh a sam mi khempeuh kiangah amah nai om hi.
verses.19: Amah a zahtakte始 deihna a kicingin tungsak a, amaute始 kikona zong za-in amaute a hon khia hi.
verses.20: Topa in amah a itte khempeuh kem a, ahih hangin migilo khempeuh amah in susia ding hi.
verses.21: Topa ka phat tawntung ding hi. Mi khempeuh in a tawntungin ama min siangtho phat ta uh hen.
